SEARCH
Package io.github.josephearl.result

Interface Result<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
Result.Failure, Result.Success
public sealed interface Result<T> permits Result.Success<T>, Result.Failure<T>
A discriminated union that encapsulates a successful outcome with a value of type T or a failure with an arbitrary Throwable exception. Instances of Result<T> are either an instance of Result.Success<T> or Result.Failure<T>.

This is a value-based class; programmers should treat instances that are equal as interchangeable and should not use instances for synchronization, or unpredictable behavior may occur. or example, in a future release, synchronization may fail.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Interface
    Description
    static final record 
    Result.Failure<T>
    A Result representing a failure.
    static final record 
    Result.Success<T>
    A Result representing a successful outcome.

    Method
    Description
    Throwable
    exceptionOrNull()
    Returns the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or null if this is a Result.Success.

    failure(@NonNull Throwable exception)
    Returns a Result.Failure that encapsulates the given exception.

    filter(Predicate<? super T> predicate)
    Returns this if this is a Result.Success and the value matches the given predicate or a Result.Failure otherwise.
    <R> Result<R>

    Applies the given exceptionAction function to the encapsulated Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.

    Returns the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success This is like flatMap(Function) but for the exception.

  • Method Details

    • of

      static <T> Result<T> of(@NonNull @NonNull Callable<? extends T> callable)
      Returns a Result that encapsulates the outcome of calling the given callable function as a Result.Success containing the return value or a Result.Failure containing the exception thrown.

      Note: only non-fatal exceptions (instances of Exception) are caught. Other instances of Throwable) (i.e. Errors) will be thrown.

    • success

      static <T> Result.Success<T> success(@NonNull T value)
      Returns a Result.Success that encapsulates the given value.

    • failure

      static <T> Result.Failure<T> failure(@NonNull @NonNull Throwable exception)
      Returns a Result.Failure that encapsulates the given exception.

    • isSuccess

      boolean isSuccess()
      Returns true if this is a Result.Success, false otherwise.

    • isFailure

      default boolean isFailure()
      Returns true if this a Result.Failure, false otherwise.

    • ifSuccess

      void ifSuccess(@NonNull @NonNull Consumer<? super T> action)
      Applies the given action function to the encapsulated value if this is a Result.Success.

    • ifFailure

      void ifFailure(@NonNull @NonNull Consumer<? super Throwable> exceptionAction)
      Applies the given exceptionAction function to the encapsulated Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.

    • ifSuccessOrElse

      default void ifSuccessOrElse(@NonNull @NonNull Consumer<? super T> action, @NonNull @NonNull Consumer<? super Throwable> exceptionAction)
      Applies the given action function to the value if this is a Result.Success or conversely the given exceptionAction function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.

    • filter

      Result<T> filter(Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Returns this if this is a Result.Success and the value matches the given predicate or a Result.Failure otherwise. Returns a new Result.Failure encapsulating a NoSuchElementException if the value does not match the predicate, or this if this is a Result.Failure.

    • fold

      <R> R fold(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super T,? extends R> mapper, @NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends R> exceptionMapper)
      Returns the outcome of applying the given mapper function to the value if this is a Result.Success or the exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.

    • map

      <R> Result<R> map(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super T,? extends R> mapper)
      Returns a Result.Success that encapsulates the outcome of applying the given mapper function to the value if this is a Result.Success or this if this is a Result.Failure.

    • flatMap

      <R> Result<R> flatMap(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super T,? extends Result<? extends R>> mapper)
      Returns the outcome of applying the given mapper function to the value if this is a Result.Success or this if this is a Result.Failure.

    • mapFailure

      Result<T> mapFailure(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends Throwable> exceptionMapper)
      Returns a Result.Failure that encapsulates the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success. This is like the map(Function) but for the exception.

    • or

      Result<T> or(@NonNull @NonNull Supplier<? extends Result<? extends T>> supplier)
      Returns the outcome of calling the given supplier function if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success.

    • orElse

      T orElse(T defaultValue)
      Returns the value if this is a Result.Success or the given defaultValue if this is a Result.Failure.

    • orElseGet

      T orElseGet(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends T> exceptionMapper)
      Returns the value if this is a Result.Success or the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.

    • orElseThrow

      T orElseThrow() throws Throwable
      Returns the value if this is a Result.Success or throws the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.
      Throws:
      Throwable

    • orElseThrow

      <X extends Throwable> T orElseThrow(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends X> exceptionMapper) throws X
      Returns the value if this is a Result.Success or throws the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure.
      Throws:
      X

    • exceptionOrNull

      Throwable exceptionOrNull()
      Returns the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or null if this is a Result.Success.

    • recover

      Result.Success<T> recover(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends T> exceptionMapper)
      Returns a Result.Success that encapsulates the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success. This is like the map(Function) but for the exception.

    • recoverWith

      Result<T> recoverWith(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends Result<? extends T>> exceptionMapper)
      Returns the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success This is like flatMap(Function) but for the exception.

    • toOptional

      Optional<T> toOptional()
      Returns an Optional containing the value if this is a Result.Success or an empty Optional if this is a Result.Failure.
